title: After finding a match, on the last second u are about to be put in the match the game freezes
body: The game freezes for like 10 seconds and i can go into profile or press play to start a game but it says u are already in a game, its so weird and i always join last now cause of it

replies.body: also i have now been banned for 5 min due to this, pls fix
What happens when you enter a custom game?
